text: Roger Stuart Bacon (June 29, 1926 - October 4, 2021) was a Nova Scotia politician. He was born in Upper Nappan, Nova Scotia. He was the 21st Premier of Nova Scotia from 1990 to 1991. He was also a member of the Nova Scotia House of Assembly between 1970 until 1993. Bacon was a member of the Progressive Conservative Association of Nova Scotia. Bacon died on October 4, 2021 in Amherst, Nova Scotia at the age of 95.Former Nova Scotia premier Roger Bacon remembered as agricultural pioneer ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Premiers of Nova Scotia
